thread.title: Students Protest School Renaming After $100 Million Gift
thread.title_full: Students Protest School Renaming After $100 Million Gift - WSJ

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Students Protest School Renaming After $100 Million Gift
text:
A $100 million donation? Thanks—but not with strings attached.
Some students and alumni at New York University’s newly renamed engineering school in Brooklyn are criticizing the name change, which was announced this week to honor a gift from a university trustee.
On Monday, then-NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering said it was getting... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
